meta.title: サービス・インタラクション
settings.numberGenerators.helpText:
新しい番号ジェネレーターを FOLIO アプリと連携させるには、開発作業が必要です。
新しい番号ジェネレーターを作成する前に、{helpDocumentationLink} を確認してください。
settings.numberGenerators.name: 名称
settings.numberGenerators.name.info: The display label of the number generator. Used to group number generator sequences, and select from them in certain circumstances.
settings.numberGenerators.code.info: A unique string representing the number generator for technical purposes. Must not contain whitespaces.
settings.numberGenerators.sequences.info: The count of the number of sequences assigned to this generator.
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.code.i: Unique code of the number generator sequence. This must be unique within the number generator and contain no whitespaces. Once set, this field can no longer be changed.
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.name: 名前
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.name.i: Name of the number generator sequence. In cases where a selection from number sequences is required, this name will be displayed in the Modal for generating a new number. This field is editable.
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.checkD: チェック ディジットのチェック方法。チェックサムを計算しない場合は「なし」を選択します。チェックサムの詳細については、ドキュメントを参照してください。
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.format: フォーマット フィールドは、生成される番号の長さを定義します。# を使用して、パディング（埋め込み）なしの長さを定義します (例: "####")。または、文字を使用してパディング（埋め込み）を含めます。たとえば、"0000" は長さを 4 に設定し、ゼロを追加して 0045 などの出力を生成します。
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.output: The output template defines the rules applied to create the sequence. Templates are formed using Groovy. See below for more information.
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.nextVa: This field shows the next value in the sequence based on the current value in the database. It can be set manually as the starting value for a new sequence.
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.enable: An enabled number generator sequence will be displayed when selecting the sequence in the App UI. A sequence with the status false will not be displayed in the App UI until it is enabled again.
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.checks: 値< 1 未満のチェックサムの使用はサポートされていません。
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.delete: Number generator sequence {name} will be permanently deleted.
The sequence may be in use in one or more apps. If in doubt, consider disabling the sequence instead.
numberGenerator.generateDisabledSequence: This sequence is marked as disabled and cannot be generated from. Please contact a system admin
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.maximu: This is the maximum possible value for the sequence. When the maximum is reached, the sequence will no longer be usable.
The maximum value must be smaller than the maximum imposed by the length of the "format" field.
When set, a warning will be displayed to users of the sequence when its value is reached. Must be lower than the maximum value.
A warning threshold value cannot be set when there is no maximum value specified.
Warning threshold value must be strictly lower than maximum value.
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.nextVa: Changing the "next value" field can result in non-unique generated numbers.
numberGenerator.warning: Warning: The number was generated successfully but with an unspecified warning. It could be a temporary glitch. If this issue recurs please contact your administrator.
numberGenerator.warning.sequenceOverThre: Warning: The number generator sequence {name} is approaching {maxVal}, its maximum value.
numberGenerator.warning.sequenceHitMaxim: Warning: The number generator sequence {name} has now reached its maximum value of {maxVal}and cannot be used again.
numberGenerator.error: Error: Unable to generate a number using the sequence {name}. Please try again. If this error recurs contact your administrator.
numberGenerator.error.sequenceOverMaximu: Error: The number was not generated because the sequence {name} has reached {maxVal}, its maximum value. Please select a different sequence or contact your administrator.
noResultsFound: 結果が見つかりません
numberGenerator.modal.includeAtMaxSequen: Include sequences which have reached their maximum value
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.callou: Error: Sequence {name} was not created. Check that the code is unique and try saving again. If this error recurs please contact your administrator.
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.preChe: Create rules to define the number to be inputted when calculating the check digit. Both the prefix and suffix can be templated, using Groovy markup. Use $'{'generated_number'}' as placeholder for the generated number. E.g. 05$'{'generated_number'}'01
settings.numberGeneratorSequences.format: Use # for digits without padding (e.g., #### for four digits).
To add padding, specify the character. E.g., 0000 for leading zeros, resulting in outputs like 0045.

If a Maximum value is set, the Format length must match it. The maximum value field enforces the length of the field, e.g. the maximum value of 9999 indicates a maximum length of four characters and must be paired with a matching format value, e.g. #### or 0000.
